MarkerID.Description: Unique identifier for each marker. This column must appear first in the file.

PeelingDepth.Description: Depth “distance” from cortex surface to the target point OR from the entry marker to the target marker.

target_x.Description: X-coordinate of the target point in millimeters

target_y.Description: Y-coordinate of the target point in millimeters

target_z.Description: Z-coordinate of the target point in millimeters

entry_x.Description: X-coordinate of the entry point in millimeters

entry_y.Description: Y-coordinate of the entry point in millimeters

entry_z.Description: Z-coordinate of the entry point in millimeters

Matrix4D.Description: 4x4 affine transformation matrix for the coil positioning (instrument markers of Localite systems)

coil_x.Description: X component of coil's origin location.

coil_y.Description: Y component of coil's origin location.

coil_z.Description: Z component of coil's origin location.

normal_x.Description: X component of coil normal vector.

normal_y.Description: Y component of coil normal vector.

normal_z.Description: Z component of coil normal vector.

direction_x.Description: X component of coil direction vector.

direction_y.Description: Y component of coil direction vector.

direction_z.Description: Z component of coil direction vector.

ElectricFieldMax_x.Description: X coordinate of max electric field point.

ElectricFieldMax_y.Description: Y coordinate of max electric field point.

ElectricFieldMax_z.Description: Z coordinate of max electric field point.

Timestamp.Description: Timestamp of the stimulation event in ISO 8601 format
